name: Super Sako
description: '''Sarkis Levoni Balasanyan''' ({{langx|hy|Սարգիս Լևոնի Բալասանյան}}; born August 17, 1978), professionally known as '''Super Sako''' ({{langx|hy|Սուպեր Սաքո}}), is an [[Armenian Americans|Armenian-American]] rapper, singer, DJ and record producer based in [[Los Angeles]]. He is best known for his hit single "[[Mi Gna]]," which ranked at #4 in France and #2 in Romania music charts in 2018.
